languages.text: "Жаль только, что эти меры не спасли ее в решающий момент..."

languages.text: «Lástima que no bastase para salvarla cuando más falta hacía...».

languages.text: 「最も重要な時に彼女を救えなかったのは、残念です…」
languages.original_text: "It's too bad that wasn't enough to save her when it mattered most..."

traits.locale_text: 「最も重要な時に彼女を救えなかったのは、残念です…」

languages.text: “可到了最关键的时候，那些安保措施却没能救她一命，真是太糟糕了……”
languages.original_text: "It's too bad that wasn't enough to save her when it mattered most..."

traits.locale_text: “可到了最关键的时候，那些安保措施却没能救她一命，真是太糟糕了……”

languages.text: "Ein Jammer, dass er sie nicht retten konnte, als es am wichtigsten war ..."
languages.original_text: "It's too bad that wasn't enough to save her when it mattered most..."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Jammer, dass er sie nicht retten konnte, als es am wichtigsten war ..."

languages.text: « Dommage que ça n'ait pas suffi à la sauver… »
languages.original_text: "It's too bad that wasn't enough to save her when it mattered most..."

traits.locale_text: « Dommage que ça n'ait pas suffi à la sauver… »

languages.text: "En önemli zamanda o önlemlerin bile Theodora'yı kurtarmaya yetmemesi çok üzücü..."
languages.original_text: "It's too bad that wasn't enough to save her when it mattered most..."
